<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/attributes-h">llvm/IR/Attributes.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/pass-h">llvm/Pass.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/codegen-h">llvm/Support/CodeGen.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h">llvm/Support/Compiler.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h">llvm/Support/Debug.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h">llvm/Support/ErrorHandling.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h">llvm/Support/MathExtras.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/raw-ostream-h">llvm/Support/raw&#95;ostream.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetmachine-h">llvm/Target/TargetMachine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/target/targetoptions-h">llvm/Target/TargetOptions.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;algorithm&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;cassert&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;cstdint&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;iterator&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;limits&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;map&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;optional&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;utility&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &lt;vector&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE &quot;hexagon-pei&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hexagon stack frame layout as defined by the ABI:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                       Incoming arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                       passed via stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        SP during function&#39;s                 FP during function&#39;s     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    +-- runtime (top of stack)               runtime (bottom) --+     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    |                                                           |     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --++---------------------+------------------+-----------------++-+-------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |  parameter area for  |  variable-size   |   fixed-size    |LR|  arg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   |   called functions   |  local objects   |  local objects  |FP|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --+----------------------+------------------+-----------------+--+-------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &lt;-    size known    -&gt; &lt;- size unknown -&gt; &lt;- size known  -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Low address                                                 High address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;--- stack growth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - In any circumstances, the outgoing function arguments are always accessi-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ble using the SP, and the incoming arguments are accessible using the FP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If the local objects are not aligned, they can always be accessed using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   the FP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - If there are no variable-sized objects, the local objects can always be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   accessed using the SP, regardless whether they are aligned or not. (The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   alignment padding will be at the bottom of the stack (highest address),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   and so the offset with respect to the SP will be known at the compile-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   -time.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only complication occurs if there are both, local aligned objects, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dynamically allocated (variable-sized) objects. The alignment pad will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// placed between the FP and the local objects, thus preventing the use of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP to access the local objects. At the same time, the variable-sized objects</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be between the SP and the local objects, thus introducing an unknown</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distance from the SP to the locals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To avoid this problem, a new register is created that holds the aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address of the bottom of the stack, referred in the sources as AP (aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer). The AP will be equal to &quot;FP-p&quot;, where &quot;p&quot; is the smallest pad</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that aligns AP to the required boundary (a maximum of the alignments of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all stack objects, fixed- and variable-sized). All local objects&#91;1&#93; will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then use AP as the base pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#91;1&#93; The exception is with &quot;fixed&quot; stack objects. &quot;Fixed&quot; stack objects get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// their name from being allocated at fixed locations on the stack, relative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the FP. In the presence of dynamic allocation and local alignment, such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// objects can only be accessed through the FP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Illustration of the AP:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                                FP --+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ---------------+---------------------+-----+-----------------------++-+--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Rest of the  | Local stack objects | Pad |  Fixed stack objects  |LR|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   stack frame  | (aligned)           |     |  (CSR, spills, etc.)  |FP|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ---------------+---------------------+-----+-----------------+-----+--+--</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                      |&lt;-- Multiple of the --&gt;|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                           stack alignment    +-- AP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AP is set up at the beginning of the function. Since it is not a dedi-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cated (reserved) register, it needs to be kept live throughout the function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be available as the base register for local object accesses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Normally, an address of a stack objects is obtained by a pseudo-instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PS&#95;fi. To access local objects with the AP register present, a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pseudo-instruction needs to be used: PS&#95;fia. The PS&#95;fia takes one extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument compared to PS&#95;fi: the first input register is the AP register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This keeps the register live between its definition and its uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AP register is originally set up using pseudo-instruction PS&#95;aligna:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   AP = PS&#95;aligna A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   A  - required stack alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The alignment value must be the maximum of all alignments required by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any stack object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The dynamic allocation uses a pseudo-instruction PS&#95;alloca:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Rd = PS&#95;alloca Rs, A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Rd - address of the allocated space</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Rs - minimum size (the actual allocated can be larger to accommodate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        alignment)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   A  - required alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="#a881d10d8f0033a509a45e2991bd6c707"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a881d10d8f0033a509a45e2991bd6c707">DisableDeallocRet</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;disable-hexagon-dealloc-ret&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Disable Dealloc Return for Hexagon target&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function used to determine when to eliminate the stack frame for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions marked as noreturn and when the noreturn-stack-elim options are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specified. When both these conditions are true, then a FP may not be needed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the function makes a call. It is very similar to enableCalleeSaveSkip,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but it used to check if the allocframe can be eliminated as well.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ObjSize &lt;= 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OpcodeChecker = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ObjSize &lt;= 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OpcodeChecker = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ObjSize &lt;= 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OpcodeChecker = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ObjSize &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">            OpcodeChecker = 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpcodeChecker) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">            LDOpc = Hexagon::L2&#95;loadrb&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">            STOpc = Hexagon::S2&#95;storerb&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">            LDOpc = Hexagon::L2&#95;loadrh&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">            STOpc = Hexagon::S2&#95;storerh&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 4:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">            LDOpc = Hexagon::L2&#95;loadri&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">            STOpc = Hexagon::S2&#95;storeri&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 8:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">            STOpc = Hexagon::S2&#95;storerd&#95;io;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> RegUsed = LDOpc == Hexagon::L2&#95;loadrd&#95;io ? Hexagon::D3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                          : Hexagon::R6;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoadStoreCount = ObjSize / OpcodeChecker;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ObjSize % OpcodeChecker)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ++LoadStoreCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the start location of the load. NumBytes is basically the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the caller in this case, as this function has variable argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumBytes != 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a557ea8e9084f594317d6c71f6c0b079ea1d7de3922faf213d7c937c385f27c0f2">SK&#95;FromMemTailcall</a>:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unhandled maximum callee save register&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stackoffset">StackOffset</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonframelowering/#a75d48c8917ed2a09d85cf46fcda67002"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonframelowering/#a75d48c8917ed2a09d85cf46fcda67002">HexagonFrameLowering::getFrameIndexReference</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &amp;FrameReg)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a54f334a9c8ca6d105eae383ae87e4524">getFrameInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;HRI = &#42;MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonsubtarget">HexagonSubtarget</a>&gt;().getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#adf98860d7f42290f873c82a981eb0ea6">getObjectOffset</a>(FI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasAlloca = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a0509430713d587eba74220a8375948a8">hasVarSizedObjects</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasExtraAlign = HRI.hasStackRealignment(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NoOpt = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#a030edbec5a50c887caf3ec95c7c50c44">getOptLevel</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a6adf97f83acf6453d4a6a4b1070f3754">CodeGenOptLevel::None</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;HMFI = &#42;MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ab7feae1932b436c8630e247166ec42b7">getInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonmachinefunctioninfo">HexagonMachineFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FrameSize = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SP = HRI.getStackRegister();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64iseldagtodag-cpp/#a2098a5fa6ada61b6c4a1f210ad84e4a1a4ebada6a2af2bcba53ded1d7b414f081">FP</a> = HRI.getFrameRegister();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AP = HMFI.getStackAlignBaseReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It may happen that AP will be absent even HasAlloca &amp;&amp; HasExtraAlign</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is true. HasExtraAlign may be set because of vector spills, without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned locals or aligned outgoing function arguments. Since vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spills will ultimately be &quot;unaligned&quot;, it is safe to use FP as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In fact, in such a scenario the stack is actually not required to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned, although it may end up being aligned anyway, since this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// particular case is not easily detectable. The alignment will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unnecessary, but not incorrect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unfortunately there is no quick way to verify that the above is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indeed the case (and that it&#39;s not a result of an error), so just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assume that missing AP will be replaced by FP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (A better fix would be to rematerialize AP from FP and always align</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector spills.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseFP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, UseAP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default: use SP (except at -O0).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use FP at -O0, except when there are objects with extra alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That additional alignment requirement may cause a pad to be inserted,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which will make it impossible to use FP to access objects located</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// past the pad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NoOpt &amp;&amp; !HasExtraAlign)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UseFP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ae6e7e975f7a4e5d535be32068a7c67df">isFixedObjectIndex</a>(FI) || MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a11d6e0b1aa8f7709f0330318b2cc5f1b">isObjectPreAllocated</a>(FI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixed and preallocated objects will be located before any padding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so FP must be used to access them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UseFP |= (HasAlloca || HasExtraAlign);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasAlloca) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasExtraAlign)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UseAP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlight">        UseFP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If FP was picked, then there had better be FP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasFP = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a0c361440fb8d1e36932e65c8cc8497e7">hasFP</a>(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((HasFP || !UseFP) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;This function must have frame pointer&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Having FP implies allocframe. Allocframe will store extra 8 bytes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FP/LR. If the base register is used to access an object across these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8 bytes, then the offset will need to be adjusted by 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After allocframe:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    HexagonISelLowering adds 8 to ---+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    the offsets of all stack-based   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    arguments (&#42;)                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   getObjectOffset &lt; 0   0     8  getObjectOffset &gt;= 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ------------------------+-----+------------------------&gt; increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &lt;local objects&gt;     |FP/LR|    &lt;input arguments&gt;     addresses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -----------------+------+-----+------------------------&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                  |      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    SP/AP point --+      +-- FP points here (&#42;&#42;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    somewhere on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    this side of FP/LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (&#42;) See LowerFormalArguments. The FP/LR is assumed to be present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (&#42;&#42;) &#42;FP == old-FP. FP+0..7 are the bytes of FP/LR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The lowering assumes that FP/LR is present, and so the offsets of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the formal arguments start at 8 If FP/LR is not there we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reduce the offset by 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; !HasFP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> -= 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseFP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FrameReg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64iseldagtodag-cpp/#a2098a5fa6ada61b6c4a1f210ad84e4a1a4ebada6a2af2bcba53ded1d7b414f081">FP</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseAP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FrameReg = AP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FrameReg = SP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the actual offset in the instruction. If there is no FP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (in other words, no allocframe), then SP will not be adjusted (i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there will be no SP -= FrameSize), so the frame size should not be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate a set of unique, callee-saved registers (SRegs), where each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register in the set is maximal in terms of sub-/super-register relation,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e. for each R in SRegs, no proper super-register of R is also in SRegs.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (3) Collect all registers that have at least one sub-register in SRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and also have no sub-registers that are reserved. These will be the can-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// didates for saving as a whole instead of their individual sub-registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (Saving R17:16 instead of R16 is fine, but only if R17 was not reserved.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> TmpSup(Hexagon::NUM&#95;TARGET&#95;REGS);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TmpSup&#91;SR&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> x = TmpSup.find&#95;first(); x &gt;= 0; x = TmpSup.find&#95;next(x)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;TmpSup:  &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; <a href="#acee1b8853250afb7856e26623c828491">dump&#95;registers</a>(TmpSup, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (4) Include all super-registers found in (3) into SRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SRegs |= TmpSup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;SRegs.4: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; <a href="#acee1b8853250afb7856e26623c828491">dump&#95;registers</a>(SRegs, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (5) For each register R in SRegs, if any super-register of R is in SRegs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove R from SRegs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> x = SRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a2da3bac3ad70ccb97150626385ebd6a7">find&#95;first</a>(); x &gt;= 0; x = SRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a9941bbcdd7fadda44146fcc6f91af71f">find&#95;next</a>(x)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SRegs&#91;SR&#93;)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now, for each register that has a fixed stack slot, create the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object for it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CSI.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot">SpillSlot</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot">TargetFrameLowering::SpillSlot</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumFixed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t MinOffset = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CS offsets are negative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot">SpillSlot</a> &#42;FixedSlots = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonframelowering/#acb02b62a77b649bcc7c89b940563bbee">getCalleeSavedSpillSlots</a>(NumFixed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetframelowering/spillslot">SpillSlot</a> &#42;S = FixedSlots; S != FixedSlots+NumFixed; ++S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SRegs&#91;S-&gt;Reg&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;RC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getMinimalPhysRegClass(S-&gt;Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FI = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ad2270087c6b8d7061c3a5e83fb61c0a6">CreateFixedSpillStackObject</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getSpillSize(&#42;RC), S-&gt;Offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinOffset = std::min(MinOffset, S-&gt;Offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSI.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a>(S-&gt;Reg, FI));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SRegs&#91;S-&gt;Reg&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There can be some registers that don&#39;t have fixed slots. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to store R0-R3 in functions with exception handling. For each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// such register, create a non-fixed stack object.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> x = SRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a2da3bac3ad70ccb97150626385ebd6a7">find&#95;first</a>(); x &gt;= 0; x = SRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a9941bbcdd7fadda44146fcc6f91af71f">find&#95;next</a>(x)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R = x;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;RC = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getMinimalPhysRegClass(R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getSpillSize(&#42;RC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Off = MinOffset - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>-&gt;getSpillAlign(&#42;RC), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Off &amp;= -Alignment.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FI = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ad2270087c6b8d7061c3a5e83fb61c0a6">CreateFixedSpillStackObject</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, Off);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MinOffset = std::min(MinOffset, Off);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CSI.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/calleesavedinfo">CalleeSavedInfo</a>(R, FI));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SRegs&#91;R&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Rd  = alloca Rs, #A</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Rs and Rd are different registers, use this sequence:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Rd  = and(Rd, #-A)    ; if necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    r29 = and(r29, #-A)   ; if necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Rd  = add(Rd, #CF)    ; CF size aligned to at most A</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Rd  = add(Rd, #CF)    ; CF size aligned to at most A</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the stack. Since the offset field is not extendable, if the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size exceeds the offset limit (6 bits, shifted), the stores will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require a new base register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasImmStack = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinLS = ~0<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea7b774effe4a349c6dd82ad4f4f21d34c">u</a>;   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Log&#95;2 of the memory access size.</span></CodeLine>
